```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
fansi::set_knit_hooks(knitr::knit_hooks)
options(crayon.enabled = TRUE, width = 75, cli.width = 75)

knit_print.grViz <- function(x, ...) {
  x %>% 
    DiagrammeRsvg::export_svg() %>% 
    c("`````{=html}\n", ., "\n`````\n") %>% 
    knitr::asis_output()
}
```

This vignette describes which changes are necessary to adapt your code when updating the {dm} package version from a version `0.0.5.9002` or lower to `0.0.5.9003` or higher.
